You may also view your case history by selecting the 'Case History' tab on the main 'Forms &amp; File Uploads' page.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Providing Documentation Online"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"Can I view forms that I previously submitted and/or provide additional information regarding my case?","answer":"<p>On the main 'Forms &amp; File Uploads' page, select the 'Case History' tab to see a list of your previously submitted cases. You can select 'ADD INFORMATION' to provide additional information to an existing case.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Providing Documentation Online"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"How do I know that Credit One Bank received my documentation?","answer":"<p>When you submit a form online, your information and any files you choose to upload will be securely transmitted to our Customer Service team. You will be presented with a confirmation receipt that includes a case number. We recommend that you print this receipt for future reference. You may also view your case history by selecting the 'Case History' tab on the main 'Forms &amp; File Uploads' page.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Confirmation and Security"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"Are files that I choose to upload transmitted securely?","answer":"<p>Yes. Credit One Bank is committed to protecting your personal information. We use the latest encryption technology with a Digital Certificate issued by an industry-leading Certificate Authority to protect sensitive information that is transmitted over the Internet.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Confirmation and Security"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"What file types can I upload?","answer":"<p>We accept the following file types: .doc, .docx, .gif, .jpeg, .jpg, .pdf, .png, .ppt, .pptx, .rtf, .tif, .tiff, .txt, .xls, .xlsx. The maximum individual file size must not exceed 2MB.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"File Upload Details and Alternative Submission"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"How long do I have to provide documentation that was requested from me?","answer":"<p>Generally, you must fulfill a request for documentation within 30 days of the date of the letter/notification you received.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"File Upload Details and Alternative Submission"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"Instead of submitting my documentation online, can I mail it in?","answer":"<p>Yes. While the fastest way to provide documentation to us is by utilizing the 'Forms &amp; File Uploads' section of our website, you may also send us the requested documentation via postal mail:</p>\n<p>Credit One Bank<br>\nP.O. Box 98873<br>\nLas Vegas, NV 89193-8873</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"File Upload Details and Alternative Submission"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"Will I receive a follow-up response regarding my case?","answer":"<p>Yes. You should receive a written response via postal mail within 14 days.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Case Follow-Up and Closure"},{"icon":null,"url":"","question":"Will I be notified when my case has been closed?","answer":"<p>Yes. We will notify you via postal mail.</p>\n","subcategory":"","slugOverride":"","subheading":"Case Follow-Up and Closure"}]}],"frequentQuestions":[],"questionPage":"Credit Protection FAQs",":type":"cob-corp-acquisition/components/creditonebank/faq-menu"}},":type":"wcm/foundation/components/responsivegrid"},"experiencefragment_974994366":{"id":"experiencefragment-457e6b27d6","configured":false,"dataLayer":{"experiencefragment-457e6b27d6":{"@type":"cob-corp-acquisition/components/experiencefragment","repo:modifyDate":"2023-01-03T21:49:06Z"}},":type":"cob-corp-acquisition/components/experiencefragment","classNames":"aem-xf empty",":itemsOrder":[],":items":{}},"experiencefragment_1437571018":{"id":"experiencefragment-f5fb6085b4","configured":true,"localizedFragmentVariationPath":"/content/experience-fragments/cob-corp-acquisition/us/en/footer/master/jcr:content","dataLayer":{"experiencefragment-f5fb6085b4":{"@type":"cob-corp-acquisition/components/experiencefragment","repo:modifyDate":"2023-01-03T21:24:26Z"}},":type":"cob-corp-acquisition/components/experiencefragment","classNames":"aem-xf",":itemsOrder":["root","image"],":items":{"root":{"columnCount":12,"gridClassNames":"aem-Grid aem-Grid--12 aem-Grid--default--12","columnClassNames":{"footer_component":"aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12"},":itemsOrder":["footer_component"],":items":{"footer_component":{"copyrightMsg":"Credit One Bank, N.A.     <script>
        const providerParams = '';
        const path = window.location.pathname;
        const flow = path.split('/')[1];
        const sessionStorageFlow = sessionStorage.getItem('currentFlow');
        let cleanMarketingAttributes = false;
        
        if(sessionStorageFlow && sessionStorageFlow !== flow){
            cleanMarketingAttributes = true;
            sessionStorage.removeItem('MarketingAttributes');
        } 
        sessionStorage.setItem('currentFlow', flow);        
        try {
            if (providerParams) {
                const parseArrayToObj = (obj, accumulator = {}) => {
                    const toParse = (typeof obj === 'string' ? JSON.parse(obj) : obj) || {};
                    if (Array.isArray(toParse)) {
                        for (const entry of toParse) {
                            if ('Name' in entry && 'Value' in entry) {
                                accumulator[entry.Name] = entry.Value;
                            } else if ('Key' in entry && 'Value' in entry) {
                                accumulator[entry.Key] = entry.Value;
                            }
                        }
                    } else if (obj) {
                        accumulator = {
                            ...accumulator,
                            ...toParse,
                        }
                    }
                    return accumulator;
                }
                const nextMarketingAttributes = parseArrayToObj(providerParams, parseArrayToObj(sessionStorage.getItem('MarketingAttributes')));
                sessionStorage.setItem('MarketingAttributes', JSON.stringify(nextMarketingAttributes));
            } else if(cleanMarketingAttributes){
                sessionStorage.setItem('MarketingAttributes', JSON.stringify({}));
            }
        } catch (ignored) {}
    </script>
